title: CIDR Set Difference
description: Calculate the difference between two sets of IP addresses and CIDR blocks (A - B)

minimal.label: Minimal
minimal.description: Generate the most efficient CIDR blocks

constrained.label: Constrained
constrained.prefixTooltip: Force alignment to this prefix boundary

input.setATooltip: The base set of IP addresses, CIDR blocks, or ranges
input.setBTooltip: The set to subtract from Set A (can be empty)

examples.title: Quick Examples
examples.tooltip: Click any example to load it into the input fields

results.title: Difference Results (A - B)
results.noResultsMessage: The difference A - B resulted in an empty set. Set B completely contains or covers Set A.

visualization.title: Set Operation Visualization
visualization.tooltip: Visual representation showing the relationship between sets A, B, and the result
